thread.title: Valero Energy Corporation to Announce Third Quarter 2015 Earnings Results on October 28, 2015 - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: Valero Energy Corporation to Announce Third Quarter 2015 Earnings Results on October 28, 2015 - Yahoo Finance

author: Valero Energy Corporation
title: Valero Energy Corporation to Announce Third Quarter 2015 Earnings Results on October 28, 2015 - Yahoo Finance
text:
SAN ANTONIO, Sept. 24, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Valero Energy Corporation ( VLO ) today announced that it will host a conference call on October 28, 2015 at 11:00 a.m. ET to discuss third quarter earnings results, which will be released earlier that day, and provide an update on company operations.
Persons interested in listening to the presentation live via the internet may log on to Valero's web site at www.valero.com .
About Valero
Valero Energy Corporation, through its subsidiaries, is an international manufacturer and marketer of transportation fuels, other petrochemical products and power. Valero subsidiaries employ approximately 10,000 people, and assets include 15 petroleum refineries with a combined throughput capacity of approximately 2.9 million barrels per day, 11 ethanol plants with a combined production capacity of 1.3 billion gallons per year, a 50-megawatt wind farm, and renewable diesel production from a joint venture. Through subsidiaries, Valero owns the general partner of Valero Energy Partners LP ( VLP ), a midstream master limited partnership. Approximately 7,400 outlets carry the Valero, Diamond Shamrock, Shamrock and Beacon brands in the United States and the Caribbean; Ultramar in Canada; and Texaco in the United Kingdom and Ireland. Valero is a Fortune 500 company based in San Antonio. Please visit www.valero.com for more information.
Contacts

To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/valero-energy-corporation-to-announce-third-quarter-2015-earnings-results-on-october-28-2015-300148811.html
